NZ Herald comments: The stories open for discussion today https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz-herald-comments-the-stories-open-for-discussion-today/BETD7I6HSZCYDPI7QGKL3VCC2U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz-herald-comments-the-stories-open-for-discussion-today/BETD7I6HSZCYDPI7QGKL3VCC2U/ Want to have your say on our stories? Here's how. Thu, 19 Dec 2024 04:09:14 +0000 Finance Minister Nicola Willis. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Kiwi K.A.R.E completes 250 missions aiding Ukraine in war zones https://www.nzherald.co.nz/sunlive/news/kiwi-kare-completes-250-missions-aiding-ukraine-in-war-zones/Z4G74UDCRVC4LLYI45WJDI62CQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/sunlive/news/kiwi-kare-completes-250-missions-aiding-ukraine-in-war-zones/Z4G74UDCRVC4LLYI45WJDI62CQ/ Kiwi K.A.R.E was set up by former Tauranga mayor Tenby Powell. Thu, 19 Dec 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Kiwi K.A.R.E has delivered 25 ambulances to Ukraine, with a further 10 to be delivered next year. Photo / Supplied
‘Heartbreaking’: Historical report reveals council’s acquisition of land where water supply system is located https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/heartwriting-historical-report-reveals-councils-acquisition-of-land-where-water-supply-system-is- located/CAPGQBW7WJE2FKJJHJ6UW2XWQI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/heartwriting-historical-report-reveals-councils-acquisition-of-land-where-water-supply-system-is- located/CAPGQBW7WJE2FKJJHJ6UW2XWQI/ Zita CampbellGisborne adopts a new strategy after revealing historical land disputes. Thu, 19 Dec 2024 04:00:00 +0000 The Waingake-Pamoa joint steering group at Gisborne District Council last Thursday after the adoption of a strategic direction for Maraetahu Incorporated and the council to work towards mutual benefits on land acquired by the council since the early 1900s. From left are council regional biodiversity transformation manager Amy England, councillor Aubrey Ria, Gisborne Mayor Rehette Stoltz, Diana Kemp of Maraetaha, steering group member Daiminn Kemp, Manu Kemp of Maraetaha, council chief executive Nedine Thatcher Swann, Maraetaha Incorporated chairwoman Bella Hawkins, Maraetaha Inc trustee and strategic direction author Beth Tupara-Katene, councillor Debbie Gregory and Gisborne Deputy Mayor Josh Wharehinga. Photo / Zita Campbell
Waikato road closures: SH1 at Lake Karāpiro to close for four days in January https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waikato-road-closures-sh1-at-lake-karapiro-to-close-for-four-days-in-january/VMBZBW5HDNECTJ2ZQKV6IBKL24/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waikato-road-closures-sh1-at-lake-karapiro-to-close-for-four-days-in-january/VMBZBW5HDNECTJ2ZQKV6IBKL24/ The detour of SH1 at Karapiro will take an extra 18 minutes. Thu, 19 Dec 2024 03:54:32 +0000 SH1 at Lake Karapiro will be closed for four days in January. Photo / Duncan Brown

Thu, 19 Dec 2024 03:49:54 +0000 The crash has closed SH6 north of Kingston. Photo / Google
Prime Minister Christopher Luxon won’t attend Waitangi Treaty Grounds celebrations, will be ‘elsewhere’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/prime-minister-christopher-luxon-wont-attend-waitangi-treaty-ground-celebrations-will-be-elsewhere/EQ4LKYUKCZA4DHBNIJJ4PK65JM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/prime-minister-christopher-luxon-wont-attend-waitangi-treaty-ground-celebrations-will-be-elsewhere/EQ4LKYUKCZA4DHBNIJJ4PK65JM/ Jamie Ensor, Adam PearseWhere the Prime Minister will be on national day is unclear. Thu, 19 Dec 2024 03:40:30 +0000 Prime Minister Christopher Luxon at the Treaty grounds ahead of Waitangi Day this year. He says he will be heading "elsewhere" for the national day in 2025. Photo / Michael Cunningham
Body found in Waikato River believed to be missing person https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/body-found-in-waikato-river- believe-to-be-missing-person/H56KFOPUY5HJ7AO23ENQJEEHS4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/body-found-in-waikato-river- believe-to-be-missing-person/H56KFOPUY5HJ7AO23ENQJEEHS4/ The body is believed to be a person who jumped from Pukete Bridge on Saturday. Thu, 19 Dec 2024 03:26:40 +0000 Police confirm they have located a body in the Waikato River believed to be the person who jumped from Pukete Bridge on Saturday night. Photo / Maryana Garcia
Auckland Transport bus driver assaulted by passenger on North Shore https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-transport-bus-driver-assaulted-by-passenger-on-north-shore/ZZQL4XK47ZGQRERM2NZXECO3U4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-transport-bus-driver-assaulted-by-passenger-on-north-shore/ZZQL4XK47ZGQRERM2NZXECO3U4/ A 31yo man has been charged with wilful damage and injuring with intent to injure. Thu, 19 Dec 2024 03:23:36 +0000 The Akoranga transport centre incident is the latest in a series in which Auckland bus drivers have been targeted. Photo / Michael Craig
SH1 Mangamuka Gorge highway to the North fixed and open https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sh1-mangamuka-gorge-highway-to-the-north-fixed-and-open/DOI743MO4NESBGXRHNLM6DPMKE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sh1-mangamuka-gorge-highway-to-the-north-fixed-and-open/DOI743MO4NESBGXRHNLM6DPMKE/ David FisherMangamuka Gorge has opened again after years of closure after rain caused multiple slips. Thu, 19 Dec 2024 02:58:39 +0000 The moment the road was opened by Transport Minister Simeon Brown (centre) flanked by Far North Mayor Moko Tepania and NZTA's Steve Mutton.
Rotorua teenager Asya James named as victim of fatal December 9 SH5 crash https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/rotorua-teenager-asya-james-named-as-victim-of-fatal-december-9-sh5-crash/DGGLKXVWNBF2FP3DRPE2SKOQCI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/rotorua-teenager-asya-james-named-as-victim-of-fatal-december-9-sh5-crash/DGGLKXVWNBF2FP3DRPE2SKOQCI/ She was one of six people to lose their lives on Rotorua roads in a week. Thu, 19 Dec 2024 02:36:14 +0000 Asya James died in a crash on SH5 near Rotorua.
